recommendations: Ankit Agrawal “He has been an invaluable asset as a Senior Product Manager at AppsForBharat . He has consistently demonstrated exceptional skills and dedication in driving our product initiatives forward. His passion for understanding customer needs is unparalleled. He has this uncanny ability to get into the minds of users, read their thoughts (almost like telepathy!), and create products that leave customers raving like happy pandas. He is the ultimate team player! Working with him is an absolute joyride. Another thing I absolutely admire about Rishi is his fearless approach to tackling challenges.”

Harish Shankaran “Rishi is a wonderful person. I believe that to be an important requirement for being a good professional. He knows his trade, and is methodical in his approach. He displays ownership of assigned projects with deep sincerity. He can maintain his calm amidst chaotic situations, and analyze problems at hand. He has good people & communications skills, which he uses effectively when coordinating with varied stakeholders on a project. It was a great experience working alongside him on our projects. ”
